description.narrative: Contribuir al avance de Colombia hacia el goce de una paz sostenible y duradera, la satisfacción plena de los derechos fundamentales y un desarrollo humano integral con pertinencia cultural.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Whole of society

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Women's groups

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Youth groups
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: Others
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With urban development plans and strategies in line with the New Urban Agenda under implementation
Country has plans and strategies under implementation for the reintegration of displaced persons and/or former combatants
Country has plans and strategies under implementation for the reintegration of displaced persons and/or former combatants
Country is supported by UNDP, upon request, to establish or strengthen national infrastructures for peace
Country is supported by UNDP, upon request, to establish or strengthen national infrastructures for peace

Only applies to crisis-affected countries: Country is supported by UNDP, upon request, with targeted interventions to strengthen core government functions for sustainable recovery and improved service delivery (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.)

Proportion of displaced populations benefitting from durable solutions, disaggregated by target groups (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Displaced population benefitting

Proportion of displaced populations benefitting from durable solutions, disaggregated by target groups (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Total displaced population

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Groups representing other marginalised populations
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: Discrimination in labour markets (formal and informal sectors)
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: Reduction or redistribution of unpaid care work
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: SGBV
Country has gender-responsive measures in place for conservation, sustainable use, and equitable access to and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems: Policy frameworks
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With institutional frameworks for implementation in local and regional governments (LRGs)
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With public-private partnerships at scale for accelerating catalytic LED initiatives
Country has national plans of action for prevention of violent extremism (PVE) under implementation
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Delivery and monitoring of services
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Legal identity and civil registration
Women's participation in elections: Country has implemented Temporary Special Measures (TSMs) to ensure women’s participation and representation.

Number of people benefitting from jobs and improved livelihoods in crisis or post-crisis settings, disaggregated by sex and other characteristics (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Total
Women's participation in elections: Number of women in voter registry
Women's participation in elections: Proportion of women in governing mechanism
Women's participation in elections: Number of people on the governing mechanism of the electoral management body
Women's participation in elections: Number of people in voter registry
Number of micro, small and medium-sized enterprises utilizing supplier development platforms for inclusive and sustainable value chains

Number of people benefitting from jobs and improved livelihoods in crisis or post-crisis settings, disaggregated by sex and other characteristics (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative.
